about_the_game:
welcome you to the Universe of Galaxy Citizen – studio most ambitious open-world game .

You are Alien fight against the Red lord

Galaxy Citizen tells the story of Alien Sophie (Girl) and Niku (baby girl) and their Battle against the Red lord in the Dark Age in the Galaxy.

Key Features:

Classic Hack and slash - Download DlC ,unzip it -play classic galaxy citizen

Hauntingly beautiful vistas and locations

Freedom and Liberty -Do whatever you want in a massive open world with hundreds of locations.

Elements of an RPG – Players will obtain a variety of weapon types.

Planets- Many aliens planets (levels) to explore .

Galactic Map- Simple Galactic Map for easy teleportation to planets (levels) or maps.Play in linear or non linear manner.

Teleportation Tower - Simple Teleportation Tower for Progress.

Story and Characters – Galaxy Citizen tells the story of Alien Sophie (girl) and Niku (baby girl)

Great Soundtrack- Game has incredible orchestral and Electronic music.

Action -One man army actions in some levels

Galactic wiki - helps in understanding galaxy citizen world

Story

Story - Protect your sibling ,take her to the safest place in the galaxy

Galaxy is suffering from Dark age,where life is cheap,there is no economy and culture.

Trantord - Trantord is planet where green people lives.

Terminus- Red Lord has lost war at planet terminus..

Life mission - Fight against the Red lord non-senses.

Join Galaxy Citizen Discord

name: Galaxy City® - Season Classic

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Window 10 or later
  • Processor: i3 1.60 GHz or similar
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 710
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 40 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Window 10 or later
  • Processor: I5 3GHz or Ryzen 5 3GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 950
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 40 GB available space

Mild Themes
Scary Scenes

short_description: Galaxy City is an online Action Game set in a Alien world.Free to Play
